description:
Description
These data were collected from the CRAN web page for 13,626 R
packages. The time to complete the standard package checking
routine was collected In some cases, the package checking
process is stopped due to errors and these data are treated as
censored. It is less than 1 percent.
title: Execution time data
usage:
As predictors, the associated package source code were
downloaded and parsed to create predictors, including

parameters.Roxygen:
a binary indicator for whether Roxygen was used
for documentation.
parameters.doc_size: The disk size of the Rmd or Rnw files.
parameters.doc_count:
How many Rmd or Rnw files in the vignettes
directory.
parameters.r_size: The total disk size of the R files.
parameters.r_count: The number of R files in the R directory.
parameters.ns_import: Estimated number of imported functions or methods.
parameters.src_size: The size on disk of files in the src directory.
parameters.rforge:
a binary indicator for whether the URL field
contained a link to R-forge.
parameters.data_size: The size on disk of files in the data directory.
parameters.status: An indicator for whether the tests completed.
parameters.testthat_size:
The size on disk of files in the testthat
directory.
parameters.authors: The number of authors in the author field.
parameters.ns_export: Estimated number of exported functions or methods.
parameters.descr:
The number of characters (or, in some cases, bytes)
in the description field.
parameters.check_time:
The time (in seconds) to run ⁠R CMD check⁠
using the "r-devel-windows-ix86+x86_64' flavor.
parameters.testthat_count:
The number of files in the testthat
directory.
parameters.gh:
a binary indicator for whether the URL field contained
a GitHub link.
parameters.src_count: The number of files in the src directory.
